CustomField.description: Converts Invoice_Period__c text (in MM/YYYY format) into a standard date on the 15th of that month for use in filters and reporting.
CustomField.formula: DATE( VALUE(RIGHT(Invoice_Period__c, 4)), /* Year: last 4 characters */ VALUE(LEFT(Invoice_Period__c, 2)), /* Month: first 2 characters */ 15 /* Fixed day */ )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used for relative date filtering on dashboards and reports. Takes the Invoice Period Month and Year and converts it to a Date Format with the day set as 15th.
CustomField.label: Invoice Period Date Format
